SALARY CERTIFICATE

{{ frappe.utils.formatdate(doc.posting_date, "dd-MM-yyyy") if doc.posting_date else '' }}

To Whom It May Concern

This is to certify that {{ doc.employee_name or '' }} (Iqama No: {{ doc.iqama_no or '' }}) who is the holder of {{ doc.nationality or 'Indian' }} Passport - {{ doc.passport_no or 'P000000' }}, has been working with {{ doc.company_name or 'Hydrotech Trading Company' }}, in the capacity of {{ doc.designation or 'Designation' }}, since {{ doc.start_month or 'Month' }} {{ doc.start_year or '2024' }}.

He is drawing a total remuneration of {{ "{:,.2f}".format(doc.amount) if doc.amount else '' }} SAR ( {{ doc.amount_in_words or 'Ten Thousand Saudi Riyals' }} ) only as gross amount.

This salary certificate is being issued to Mr. {{ doc.employee_name or '' }} upon his personal request without any financial liability to our company.

For {{ doc.company_name or 'Hydrotech Trading Company' }}, ( Company Seal to be attached )



{{ doc.admin_name or 'Mr. Zakaria Al Kuwaity' }}
{{ doc.admin_designation or 'Admin Manager' }}
name: Salary Certificate
